scripts.say: Wouldn't you agree that it's a little harsh to ask about the opponent I fought before asking if I'm hurt?
Well, you made it back in one piece, didn't you? Kidding â€“ I'm sorry.
As for Glorious: she was using outdated equipment, but she fought surprisingly well. I suppose any weapon can be effective in the right hands...
Interesting. So she's worthy of my attention, then. Oh, how I long for a good fight!
Then let's continue with the operation. The enemy is injured; catching up to her won't be particularly difficult.
